name: CAPES - From Zero to Hero
description:
This is an alpha version of our game CAPES, where you take on the role of the young superhero, Orbit and use his gravity powers to defend his hometown from the minions of evil.

Luckily for him, evil isn't sending it's best. But they're still making a huge mess of the town and someone has to stop this mayhem before it gets too much!

That someone? You!

Come be a hero.

PLAYTEST SURVEY!!

This game was made for a University project by Felix, Liam, Nick and James. Or Corpseflower, which the collective likes to be called.
